message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good start
How about a 55/45 split? It's closer to even and still a good deal for both of us before inflation eats into it.
Meet me in the middle of our previous offers, 58-42 is a fair compromise
Time is ticking, Alice. I'm coming down a bit to 52/48 - let's secure a good deal while it's still worthwhile.
I'll come down a bit too, 57-43 is the lowest I'll go for now, considering inflation
Alice, let's be realistic. 51/49 is a win-win at this point.  We're losing serious money with each refusal.  Don't let greed make us both losers.
